document_data.name: Nether the Elder
document_data.mainbody: '''Nether the Elder''', also known as '''King Nether''', was the [[shaman]] king of [[Gers]], one of the seven towns whose coalition formed [[Netheril]].
document_data.Personality: The shaman king was tyrannical and egotistical in his rule.
document_data.Activities: Nether was credited with developing the calendar that began measurement at the beginning of the coalition, and was referred to as "Netheril Years" or NY.

History.Death: The shaman was assassinated by a poisoned [[dirk]] from an unknown killer, but Nether was succeeded by [[Nether the Younger]].
